alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Craven, southeastern Pitt and southwestern Beaufort Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilmar, or 7 miles southwest of River Road, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blounts Creek, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Bonnerton, Cox Crossroads, Wilmar, Edward and Ernul. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
